verbs.description: [ARG1: pineapple coconut] [V: cake] this coconut cake is a guaranteed showstopper at any holiday meal or special occasion the beautiful flakes of coconut are reminiscent of snow but one taste of the sunny pineapple will transport you to the tropics —monica kennedy johnson city tennessee cake
